txt.en: 'I hope your journey here was worth the effort. It would seem you obtained what you were looking for, did you not?'
You should speak with Sigrun, who can be found in the Misty Mountains.
Sigrun knows of Thorog and will lead the way to examine the dragon's corpse.

'You seek the dragon Thorog? Ah ha ha ha ha! You are a bit late, my friend. The undead worm was soundly defeated by a group of adventurers. If you wish to see where they won their glory and Thorog fell, I will show you.\n\n'And you have come from the Lonely Mountain, have you not? In return for this favour, you will answer the many questions I have of the dwarves who dwell there, as we go.'
You should speak with Sigrun, who can be found in the Misty Mountains.
'Come, we climb the slopes to see some dragon bones!'
